# ReadOnlyCollectionExtensions.GetWord method

Gets a Word from this array of bytes. ( { a, b, n, n + 1, ...}, n ) =&gt; (n + 1, n)

```csharp
public static int GetWord(this ReadOnlyCollection<byte> data, byte start)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| data | Target data. |
| start | Start byte. |

## Return Value

A Int32 containing the value.
